page.title: 14RECREATION Pentney & Narboro
page.content:
{Narborough}has four{football}teams, a {cricket}team and a trout fishery. The football is played on Narborough's own {field}which was purchased about 11 yrs ago. Recently further land was added giving a total area of 8 acres and will hopefully house the new community centre. The cricket team plays in beautiful parkland at Narborough Hall.
{Pentney's playing field}was recently donated by a parishioner and is used by the youngsters. There is plenty of scope for{anglers}at the Bradmoor lakes and along the River Nar.{Water Ski-ing takes place at the gravel pits. There is an{indoor bowls}centre of national standard.
Various groups organise community activities in both villages for the benefit of all.
